item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, July 13, 2024 at 7:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Unilever to slash a third of office jobs in Europe
2. Biden vows to ‘complete the job’ despite stumbles in press conference
3. Starmer’s relegation of 31 Labour MPs and peers creates cohort of potential troublemakers
4. Democrats in disarray over Biden: ‘We’re totally, totally screwed’
5. Top US House Democrat meets with Biden over re-election doubts
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, July 13, 2024 at 7:10 AM UTC
